descriptionHtml:
This mod adds parallax effect to hearthfire chimneys or vanilla, if you got this mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51330/?] Hearthfire Chimneys for Skyrim by [b]Scarla[/b][/url]
Looks pretty weird, if surrounding walls got the effect, but the chimney doesn't

Requirements:
From the farmhouse set stonewall01_p.dds

You can get that from different packs like PPR and some other parallax mods or here
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59078/?]stonewall parallax
[/url]
The mod also adds parallax effect to the interior side of the chimneys. woodpost,stonefloor and the others if you got the according _p.dds
you can get that here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/?]farmhouse meshes and textures
[/url]
author: Pfuscher aka Zerwas1
